abstract: SAP has agreed to pay $120 million to settle part of a lawsuit brought by Oracle over copyright infringement, according to a source familiar with the matter.
snippet: SAP has agreed to pay $120 million to settle part of a lawsuit brought by Oracle over copyright infringement, according to a source familiar with the matter.
lead_paragraph: From Verne G. Kopytoff at Bits:

headline.main: A Partial Settlement, but Oracle-SAP Trial Continues
